title: Suggestion for Arclight Vayne....
body:
Can we PLEASE change the color of the Silver Bolts procs to a lightly tinted gold color? I think it would really add so much to the skin since she doesn't have many particles to change from the get-go. 

And yes, I realize they are supposed to be silver and it some of her lines won't make sense, but we also have other skins (Cryocore Brand, Scorched Earth Xerath, etc) that have elements that contradict their lines in game.

replies.body: Are you referring to [these](http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MQ-I38gqeDs/VRJDLnigBlI/AAAAAAAAmsw/cNUdLNj9-kQ/s1600/bw2.jpg)? They do have a gold color to them.
In the video for the skin, they did not.

Keep in mind that SkinSpotlights is third party and not something Riot does. :] 

In the description of the video, it's noted that:

*"Note2: Turns out the bugsplat I got while loading knocked a lot of particles off, the update video which wont be done till her texture is more finalized will better reflect her particles. Her W has a golden overlay to them, her Q isn't mean to have bats."*

Hope this clarifies some things!
Good call.  Thanks for clearing that up :)
Oh they look sooooooo good! And I saw a video that didn't have the change and was disappointed, but now they are better than I imagined. Thanks for the response. (:
They might update the rings. The skin is super WIP though. It has no textures, just the model with the basic colors.
